item.title: How to promote the Quality Best Practices
item.description: How to promote the Quality Best Practices Influence or evangelize Data-Driven decisions Enforce How to promote the Quality Best Practices Two ways to promote the quality best practices are: Influencing the teams or to enforce the best practices. A periodical team reality check about the current practices is the beginning of the process. A team can easily live in their own Ivory Tower or to be biased by this statement: “We always did it that way so why changing it?
